message:
I've uploaded a github repository with a main Program file which you can run and see what Theodor meant.

Some dataflow blocks offer this functionality, like the ActionBlock, whilst others do not, guessing by your currently given examples with BufferBlock.

https://github.com/SpiritBob/Stephen-Cleary-Example/blob/master/Program.cs

When you tinker around with the above and fully understood what was going on, I'd really appreciate it if you could post a new blog explaining this in more detail!
